targets.query: SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentUserTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))
SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentSystemTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))
SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentCpuTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))
SELECT COUNT(min) FROM (SELECT MIN("raw") FROM "Milliseconds" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select count(last) from ( select last(raw),time from "NumberCores" where  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter group by "host")
select sum(last) from ( select last(raw),time from "NumberCores" where  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter group by "host")
SELECT COUNT(min) FROM (SELECT MIN("raw") FROM "Milliseconds" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentUserTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND   "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))
SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentSystemTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND   $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))
SELECT last(a) FROM (SELECT mean("norm") as a FROM "PercentCpuTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0))

SELECT MEAN(A) FROM (SELECT mean(ncores) AS A FROM "PercentSystemTime" WHERE nodetype = 'Transaction' AND  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host, pid fill(none)) WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
